AT.name: Nobunaga's Ambition
AT.description: Kampf oder Diplomatie? Schwerter oder Sanktionen? Als Herrscher über einen Krieg führenden Staat während der turbulenten feudalen Ära in der Geschichte Japans beeinflussen deine Entscheidungen den Kurs einer Nation. Nobunaga's Ambition ist ein klassisches Strategiespiel von den Meistern von Koei. Dein ultimatives Ziel ist es, Japan unter deiner Herrschaft zu vereinen. Verwalte deine Wirtschaft, baue deine Armee auf und erweitere dein Territorium. Entsende Spione, um deine Feinde zu beobachten, oder Ninjas, um Unruhe in den gegnerischen Reihen zu schüren. Und wenn all diese Maßnahmen scheitern, dann entfessele einen Krieg! Hierbei handelt es sich um die US-Version des Spiels.

AU.name: Nobunaga's Ambition
AU.description: Battle or diplomacy? Swords or sanctions? As the ruler of a warring state in the turbulent feudal period of Japanese history, your decisions will sway the course of a nation. Nobunaga's Ambition is a classic strategy game from the masters at Koei. Your ultimate goal is to unify Japan under your rule. Manage your economy, build up your army and expand your territories. Send spies to keep watch on your enemies, or dispatch ninjas to sow betrayal in rival forces. If all else fails, unleash war! This is the US version of the game.

BG.name: Nobunaga's Ambition
BG.description: Battle or diplomacy? Swords or sanctions? As the ruler of a warring state in the turbulent feudal period of Japanese history, your decisions will sway the course of a nation. Nobunaga's Ambition is a classic strategy game from the masters at Koei. Your ultimate goal is to unify Japan under your rule. Manage your economy, build up your army and expand your territories. Send spies to keep watch on your enemies, or dispatch ninjas to sow betrayal in rival forces. If all else fails, unleash war! This is the US version of the game.

BE.name: Nobunaga's Ambition
BE.description: Se battre ou négocier ? Brandir l'épée ou menacer de sanctions ? Vous gouvernez un état en guerre dans un Japon féodal particulièrement turbulent, et vos décisions écriront le futur de toute une nation. Nobunaga's Ambition est un classique du jeu de stratégie, créé par les spécialistes du genre, Koei. Votre but ultime est d'unir le Japon sous votre règne. Gérez votre économie, développez votre armée et agrandissez votre territoire. Envoyez des espions pour en apprendre plus sur vos ennemis, ou dépêchez des ninjas pour semer la discorde dans le camp adverse. Et si cela ne suffit pas, déclarez la guerre ! Ceci est la version américaine du jeu.

ES.name: Nobunaga's Ambition
ES.description: ¿Luchar o ejercer la diplomacia? ¿Empuñar la espada o sancionar? Estás a cargo de un estado en guerra en el turbulento período feudal de la historia japonesa; por tanto, tus decisiones determinarán el futuro de la nación. Nobunaga’s Ambition es un clásico juego de estrategia desarrollado por Koei. El objetivo es unificar Japón bajo tu control, por lo que tendrás que gestionar la economía, crear un ejército y expandir tu territorio. Mantén a tus enemigos bajo vigilancia gracias a los espías y asegúrate de que los ninjas siembren el germen de la traición en las fuerzas rivales. Y, si esto no es suficiente, declara la guerra. Esta es la versión estadounidense del juego.

IT.name: Nobunaga's Ambition
IT.description: Campi di battaglia o incontri diplomatici? Spade o editti? Sei al governo di uno stato in guerra nel turbolento periodo feudale della storia giapponese e le tue scelte decideranno del futuro di una nazione. Nobunaga's Ambition è un classico gioco di strategia creato dai maestri di Koei. Il tuo obiettivo è unificare il Giappone sotto la tua guida. Gestisci l'economia, consolida l'esercito e conquista nuovi territori. Invia delle spie per tenere d'occhio i tuoi avversari, o serviti dei ninja per seminare il dissenso tra le forze nemiche. E se tutto questo non bastasse, dai inizio alla guerra! Questa è la versione americana del gioco.

NL.name: Nobunaga's Ambition
NL.description: Oorlog of diplomatie? Zwaarden of sancties? Als heerser van een strijdend land in de turbulente feodale periode van de Japanse geschiedenis bepalen jouw beslissingen de toekomst van een natie. Nobunaga's Ambition is een klassieke strategiegame van de meesterontwikkelaars bij Koei. Je uiteindelijke doel is de eenmaking van Japan onder jouw bewind. Beheer de economie, bouw een leger op en breid je grondgebied uit. Gebruik spionnen om je vijanden in de gaten te houden of stuur ninja's erop uit om verraad te zaaien in het vijandelijke kamp. En als niets lukt, dan rest nog maar één middel: oorlog voeren! Dit is de Amerikaanse versie van het spel.

NZ.name: Nobunaga's Ambition
NZ.description: Battle or diplomacy? Swords or sanctions? As the ruler of a warring state in the turbulent feudal period of Japanese history, your decisions will sway the course of a nation. Nobunaga's Ambition is a classic strategy game from the masters at Koei. Your ultimate goal is to unify Japan under your rule. Manage your economy, build up your army and expand your territories. Send spies to keep watch on your enemies, or dispatch ninjas to sow betrayal in rival forces. If all else fails, unleash war! This is the US version of the game.

PL.name: Nobunaga's Ambition
PL.description: Battle or diplomacy? Swords or sanctions? As the ruler of a warring state in the turbulent feudal period of Japanese history, your decisions will sway the course of a nation. Nobunaga's Ambition is a classic strategy game from the masters at Koei. Your ultimate goal is to unify Japan under your rule. Manage your economy, build up your army and expand your territories. Send spies to keep watch on your enemies, or dispatch ninjas to sow betrayal in rival forces. If all else fails, unleash war! This is the US version of the game.

PT.name: Nobunaga's Ambition
PT.description: Guerra ou diplomacia? Espadas ou sanções? Como líder de um estado guerreiro durante a turbulenta era feudal da história japonesa, as tuas decisões irão guiar os destinos de uma nação. Nobunaga's Ambition é um clássico jogo de estratégia desenvolvido pelos criadores da Koey. O teu objetivo final é o de unificar o Japão sob o teu domínio. Gere a tua economia, forma o teu exército e expande os teus territórios. Envia espiões para vigiar os inimigos ou ninjas para semear a discórdia entre potências rivais. Se tudo o resto falhar, faz soprar os ventos da guerra! Esta é a versão do jogo para os EUA.

RU.name: Nobunaga's Ambition
RU.description: Какой язык вы предпочтете — язык войны или дипломатии? Что вы выберете: стрелы или санкции? Итак, вы — император Японии, оказавшийся у штурвала феодальной страны в неспокойное время войн и распрей. Помните: ваши решения предопределят дальнейшую судьбу народа. Nobunaga's Ambition — классическая стратегия от мастеров игростроя из студии Koei. Ваша главная задача — объединить Японию под своей властью. Вам предстоит управлять экономикой, обучать армию и расширять свои владения! Засылайте шпионов на вражеские территории и отправляйте ниндзя сеять раздор и предательство в неприятельских рядах. А если все доступные мирные средства исчерпаны, пора объявить войну! Эта версия игры предназначена для продажи в США.

SE.description: Battle or diplomacy? Swords or sanctions? As the ruler of a warring state in the turbulent feudal period of Japanese history, your decisions will sway the course of a nation.
